post.body: your techweek post? i'm not surprised! :))
dismay at abysmal quote causes foreign consultant to lose temper on twitter... heheh...
problem is the "download speed". it's driving me insane. it is quicker to download an app on my phone than on my macbook!
@budip... any suggestions for CRM software for mac? about to try Bento.
it looks creepy from here (cipete), like the city's on fire or something... #orange sky
haha - i hope you doubled your minimum then added 10%! :))
yeah, especially given the BRILLIANT things i had to say! :))
Siapa? #comments on first one.
Wuah?! Not sure that I would work for a company that has depts competing against each other for staff...
YOU NEED AN IPHONE!!! :)) I love mine. Best purchase ever made...
beach is great, but too much sun is not good! Agree that mountain is better. Mountain by sea is best!
I will believe it when I see it. I have a spare 3G iPhone waiting...
haha! spot on, i hated it. i REALLY really wanted to like it, but...
wow, well done and good luck! #interview
hi, it was ok. You? #xmas
oh well that's different! I could probably survive a week without my macbook, so long as I had my iphone ;-)
laptop! traveling lite = traveling bored! ;-)
damn, fingers crossed and praying to Allah, Isa and anyone else who will listen....
haha! I am watching my back for white kijangs with pointy hats out the top #Templar
hope u and brandon r free on Sunday night.........
Oh dear! Is he on meds? #fajarjasmin
tell me about it! i spent the day at work yesterday because no-one could get their shit together in time for xmas!
they were almost all up when I left. Look great! #javajive's exhibition
you too!
wow, a real European Christmas! Have a great time!
that explains the really cool Grover look #doing ur own hair PS when's ur next techweek post? Can u do a tech daily? Please? :))
11KB/s! That's what I get for Rp 1 juta a month. F--- YOU INDOSAT!!!
My first quote on Detik.com! http://tinyurl.com/5r8dtd
On my way to press conference about counterfeit lubricants. I hope the journalists are patient with me! :)

Morning J-tweeps... *yawn* . Wearing suit and tie today for press.
If you haven't yet seen The Day The Earth Stood Still, well don't bother. http://www.spruiked.com/blog/?p=193 (warning: blog plug)
Seat 1A again. They seriously have me confused with someone important!
selamat natal, semua
Rio Fabrian spotted in my driveway. Shorter (and fatter) than I expected. Why do so many singers have ugly tattoos?
So happy: don't have to go into office today. I AM ON HOLIDAY!!! Woohoo!!!

Wow 3 days until the long weekend! ;-)
At Eastern Promise checking out @javajive's exhibition. Pretty cool.
